comment: funny guy. can whistle with a smile on.
does not grade anything I had nothing graded until very last week of sem and we had so much needing marking.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: he does not tell you exactly what to write, but that's what the plan is. write what you want in relation to the topic, and if you write well (and I mean EXTREMELY well) and you will get an A. very very helpful. good guy would recommend

I don't know why the other comments say that they can't understand Dr. Orr. His class was very easy and I never misunderstood his directions on assignments. There are a TON of assignments but they're very very simple.
As nice as Dr. Orr is, he is impossible to understand. The instructions he gives for assignments are incredibly vague and will leave you wondering what to do in most cases.
This guy is impossible to understand. Good luck trying to get an answer to your questions. Seems he does not plan in ahead. You will do many pointless assignments in this class.
